summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DryClean POS application. Backend APIs are fully functional (21/21 tests passed) after fixing order creation bugs. Frontend navigation and most features work well, but critical POS cart functionality is broken - items cannot be added to cart when clicked.

fixed_bugs.issue: Order creation failed with 'multiple values for keyword argument status' error
fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Removed duplicate status/payment_status parameters in OrderResponse constructor

fixed_bugs.issue: Order retrieval failed with same status parameter duplication issue
fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Fixed OrderResponse constructor calls in get_orders and get_order functions

fixed_bugs.issue: Payment creation failed with duplicate status parameter

critical_bugs.issue: Items cannot be added to cart when clicked. Click handlers not firing or state not updating
critical_bugs.symptoms: No toast messages appear, cart remains empty, no console errors

integration_issues.issue: Cannot complete order flow due to cart functionality being broken

passed_tests: Login page loads correctly with demo credentials
Demo login works (admin@dryclean.com / admin123)
Dashboard shows stats and recent orders
Navigation sidebar works for all pages
POS page loads with service types (Regular/Express/Delicate)
Items are loaded and displayed (16 items)
Customer selection and creation works
Orders page shows order list with status badges
Order status advancement works
Customers page shows customer list with loyalty points
Services page shows pricing table with Regular/Express/Delicate pricing
Reports page shows analytics charts and stats
Staff page shows team members (1 Admin)
Settings page shows printer configuration options
All backend APIs working (21/21 tests passed)
Authentication and JWT tokens working
Customer management (create, read, update, search)
Order management (create, read, update status)
Payment processing (cash, card, bank transfer)
Reports and dashboard statistics
Items/Services management

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (most features work except critical cart functionality)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix POS cart functionality - items are not being added to cart when clicked. This breaks the core POS workflow. The click handlers in POSPage.js addToCart function may not be firing properly or React state is not updating. All backend APIs are working correctly, so this is a frontend JavaScript/React issue.
